Articles.Content:
Hey there. I got into this game from reading a review of Space Agency for the ipad. Someone said it was ok, but it was no Kerbal Space Program. Well, after a google search, and 30 minutes trying out the demo, I had to get the full version. I've only been at it for a week or so but it keeps me coming back for more. I've been looking for something like this ever since Buzz Aldrins Race into Space. This is a different animal but the realism, challenge, and not so bad learning curve have been a great combination. Add in a few mods, and I'm hooked. Not since maybe Civilization have I been sucked in by a game! And it's not done yet!

Anyway, great to be here and it's great to see PC gaming back so to speak.

Welcome to the forums!

I hope you will play it a lot and have fun with it.
Welcome to the forums DarthJazno, I too agree that KSP has that special quality. I think the last game that gave me this feeling was the original Red Alert.
